item.name: AfterKeyUp with ModifierFlag conditional pattern matching. (1)
item.appendix: * Change the right option key to control key.
* AfterKeyUp f1 when the left shift key and the left control key are pressed.
* AfterKeyUp f2 when the left shift key is pressed.
* AfterKeyUp f3 when the left control key is pressed.
For example, OPTION_R down, SHIFT_L down, OPTION_R up sends f2.
item.autogen:
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::CONTROL_L,
Option::KEYTOKEY_AFTER_KEYUP, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::F1,
Option::KEYTOKEY_AFTER_KEYUP, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::F2,
Option::KEYTOKEY_AFTER_KEYUP, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::F3,
Option::KEYTOKEY_AFTER_KEYUP, KeyCode::F4,

item.name: AfterKeyUp with ModifierFlag conditional pattern matching. (2)
item.appendix: * Change the right shift key to shift-right arrow.
* If the escape key is pressed, AfterKeyUp will be cancel.
item.autogen:
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT,
Option::KEYTOKEY_BEFORE_KEYDOWN, KeyCode::VK_LOCK_SHIFT_R_FORCE_ON,
Option::KEYTOKEY_AFTER_KEYUP, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_LOCK_SHIFT_R_FORCE_OFF, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,

item.name: Option::KEYTOKEY_DELAYED_ACTION
item.appendix: Change the return key x2 to the space key.
* When you press the return key twice, a space key event will be sent. (no return key events)
* When you press the return key once, a return key event will be sent.
Change control-tab to the left shift key.
* When you press control-tab twice, "left shift, a, option-b, control-c, d" will be sent.
* When you press control-tab once, "left shift" will be sent.
item.autogen:
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::RETURN, KeyCode::VK_NONE,
Option::KEYTOKEY_DELAYED_ACTION, KeyCode::RETURN,

item.name: Option::KEYTOKEY_DELAYED_ACTION (2)
item.appendix: Change the right command key x2 to shift-space.
* When you press the right command key twice, "right command, shift-space" will be sent.
* When you press the right command key once, right command key event will be sent.

item.name: Option::KEYTOKEY_INCREASE_MODIFIER_FLAGS
item.appendix: Change HJKL keys to arrow key while you press S key.
* S down, J down, S up, L down, J up, L up => down arrow, right arrow

item.name: Apply from the top sequentially (<list> and <item>)
item.appendix: (Turn on all settings. The settings labeled "skipped" will be ignored.)

item.name: Standard
item.appendix: A to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) (Standard)
Option_L to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) (Modifier)
Control+B to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) (Key+Modifier)
C to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) + [KeyRepeat]
Command+D to Shift_L (When type only, send Control_L+F) + [KeyRepeat]
F to Shift_L (When type only, send CapsLock)
G to Shift_L (When type only, send A,B,Shift_L+C,Control_L+B)
H to Shift_L (When type only, send A,B,Shift_L+C,Control_L+B) + [KeyRepeat]
I to Shift_L (When type only, send Option_L)
J to Shift_L+Option_L (When type only, send Space)
Command_R to Shift_L (Without other modifiers) (When type only, send Space)

"escape down, right shift down, escape up, right shift up" sends tab,shift.

item.name: Note:
item.appendix: DoublePressModifier always sends the first event.
For example, "change shift x2 to return" sends shift,shift,return when you press shift key twice.
If you want to cancel the first event, please use __KeyToKey__ and
For example, you should use __KeyToKey__ if you want
"change semicolon(;) twice to colon(:)" that sends either semicolon or colon.

item.name: KeyToKey
item.appendix: (X+C to Return with Option::SIMULTANEOUSKEYPRESSES_RAW (== to Space))
(Q+W to Escape if Input Source == English)
item.autogen: __SimultaneousKeyPresses__ KeyCode::S, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::J
__SimultaneousKeyPresses__ KeyCode::D, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::F

item.name: With Option::SIMULTANEOUSKEYPRESSES_POST_FROM_EVENTS_AS_RAW
item.appendix: Change D+F to lock control key.
* Unlock control key by escape key.
* Change D key to left shift key when control is locked.
* Change F key to left option key when control is locked.
When you press D+F, shift and option modifiers will be active until you release D,F keys.
* D down, F down, D up -> control down, shift down, option down, shift up
* D down, F down, F up -> control down, shift down, option down, option up
Change F+G to EXTRA1 modifier key.
* Change F key to left shift key when extra1 is pressed.
* Change G key to left option key when extra1 is pressed.

item.name: Note:
item.appendix: Basically, a sending key will not be modified by other manipulators such as __KeyToKey__.
This option allows you to modify a sending key once more by __KeyToKey__.
A space key event is sent when you press Q and W keys simultaneously with following rules.
__KeyToKey__ changes Return to Space. So, Q+W becomes a space key event.
There are two limitations of Option::SIMULTANEOUSKEYPRESSES_RAW.
This option strips modifiers from a sending key.
For example, when you use Option::SIMULTANEOUSKEYPRESSES_RAW,
"[Q+W] to Shift+Return" acts as "[Q+W] to Return".
Please append modifiers to a sending key by __KeyToKey__ or other manipulators.
This option does not send multiple keys. Only the first key will be sent.
For example, when you use Option::SIMULTANEOUSKEYPRESSES_RAW,
"[Q+W] to A,S,D,F" acts as "[Q+W] to A".
Please send multiple keys by __KeyToKey__ or other manipulators.

item.name: With KeyCode, ConsumerKeyCode
item.appendix: Left Shift+CursorMove to ScrollWheel (Left Shift will not work as modifier.)
===> Left Shift will not work as modifier.
===> Left Shift will work as modifier.

item.name: Force turn NumLock *off* at Apple Keyboards
